org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class ClusterJspHelper.NamenodeMXBeanHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ClusterJspHelper.NamenodeMXBeanHelper
  • Enclosing class:
    ClusterJspHelper

    static class ClusterJspHelper.NamenodeMXBeanHelper
extends Object
    Class for connecting to Namenode over http via JmxJsonServlet to get JMX attributes exposed by the MXBean.

      • getLiveNodeStatus

        private static void getLiveNodeStatus(Map<String,Map<String,String>> statusMap,
                     String namenodeHost,
                     String json)
                               throws IOException
        Store the live datanode status information into datanode status map and DecommissionNode.
        Parameters:
        statusMap - Map of datanode status. Key is datanode, value is an inner map whose key is namenode, value is datanode status. reported by each namenode.
        namenodeHost - host name of the namenode
        json - JSON string contains datanode status
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getDeadNodeStatus

        private static void getDeadNodeStatus(Map<String,Map<String,String>> statusMap,
                     String host,
                     String json)
                               throws IOException
        Store the dead datanode information into datanode status map and DecommissionNode.
        Parameters:
        statusMap - map with key being datanode, value being an inner map (key:namenode, value:decommisionning state).
        host - datanode hostname
        json - String
        Throws:
        IOException
